Leather straps sewn with silver thread call your companion to you when you are in need.

Companion: Uncommon

Power âœ¦ Encounter (Immediate Interrupt)

Use this power when an attack bloodies you or drops you to 0 hit points or fewer. Pull your companion 10 squares.

Level 18: Your companion teleports 10 squares into an unoccupied square adjacent to you. This power gains the teleportation keyword.

Level 28: Your companion teleports any number of squares into an unoccupied square adjacent to you. You need not have line of sight to your companion to use this power. This power gains the teleportation keyword.
